title: The Adventures of Buzz Boy & Buzz Girl
abstract: An animated adventure between an evil bee and super hero insects
description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival. This animated short depicts the adventures between an evil bee and super hero insects. Dr. Bee has hypnotised Buzz Boy to steal for him, after poisoning a peanut and jelly sandwich. Buzz Girl finds out the truth and informs Buzz Boy. Together they set out in search of Dr.Bee.  They find him and are caught up in a high speed chase which eventuates in Dr.Bee crashing into the side of a skyscraper.
